Name: Zenit DTK-1 7.62x39 & 5.45x39 muzzlebrake & compensator for AK
Description: Muzzlebrake compensator DTK-1 by Zenit is designed for installation on 7.62x39 and 5.45x39 AK-based weapon systems. Reduces recoil and counters the barrel climb. The crown on the DTK nose is meant for breaking of tampered glass. 24x1.5 mm threading. Â©Zenit
